Articles.Content:
True

The user below me has a signature

True.

The user below me is using an iPad.

False. Don't even have one, nor am I planning to get one.

The user below is playing KSP at the time of the post.

True! I'm about to land another boat for my Laythebase.

Person below me has had cake in the last week.

Maybe.

The user below me is Chobit and has come to kill us all.

False. Luckily.

The user below me wants to make peace with Chobit.

False. She has good reasons for this war.

Person below me is a Yamato fan.

True. Who isn't?

The user below me has played world of tanks.

True, my highest kill combo is 10 in my StuG III ~<3 (Although it should be noted that I've left WoT for Warthunder because Gaijin isn't ruining their games like Wargaming.net is)

The user below me watches Top Gear

Yes, Play minecraft, watch Top Gear, and getting pig (Minecraft reference 4 ya)

The user below me Is listening to Dubstep.

False - I've never heard of Dubstep before.

The user below me has killed at least one Kerbal.

False. I've killed hundreds.

The user below me hasn't killed any Kerbals.

False. Almost all KSP player has killed many kerbals way back before.

The user below me has killed probes.

True. 4679, and counting.

The user below me has or is trying to get a pilots license.

False. But I want to if I had given the choice.

User below me is a poodle.

False, but I own one.

Person below me is a spaceplane master.

false i fly spaceships not planes

the user below me doesn't have a signature

False, I make my own. In fact, I was pondering a new one

The user below me naturally walks at a perfect marching cadence (Shut up! The lifestyle grew on me!)

True, 120 step / minutes

The user below me landed on mun today

False. I spent my KSP time attempting to design a SSTO spaceplane. I failed miserably. But you know, Ad astra per aspera right?

The user below me has successfully put a probe in orbit of and has mapped Tylo.

False. I only have been to laythe, Mun, Minmus, Duna and Eeloo.

The user below me has exams today and the rest of this week.

False.

Person below me likes red.

True. It's a nice color.

The user below me plays a game. ON WINDOWS 7. Nailed it.

False. I'm playing KSP on Commodore Amiga.

User below me is using the exhaust of his computer to warm his/her snack.

False. I'm not eating. Also does your commodore play ksp at 1 fps. ONE FPS?!?!?!?! THAT'S INSANELY HIGH.

The user below me is looking at my post and is going to say true or false.
